  • Konstruktordetails

    • StageManager

      public StageManager()
      the constructor makes a Stage instance for stage and makes a com.github.ykologlu.scenechangerjfx.SceneManager instance for sceneManager

  • Methodendetails

    • changeScene

      public void changeScene(String filepath, boolean cacheLastUsedScene, boolean useCachedScene) throws IOException
      Is used to change the scenes inside the stage
      Parameter:
      filepath - defines which fxml document should be loaded
      cacheLastUsedScene - defines if the previous Scene should be cached or not
      useCachedScene - defines if the current Scene should be fetched from the cache or not
      Löst aus:
      IOException - throws an error if the wanted fxml document cannot be found

    • getStage

      public javafx.stage.Stage getStage()
      Gibt zurück:
      returns the current stage

    • setStage

      public void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Parameter:
      stage - Stage that replaces the current Stage

    • getSceneManager

      public SceneManager getSceneManager()
      Gibt zurück:
      returns the current com.github.ykologlu.scenechangerjfx.SceneManager

    • setSceneManager

      public void setSceneManager(SceneManager sceneManager)
      Parameter:
      sceneManager - com.github.ykologlu.scenechangerjfx.SceneManager that replaces the current com.github.ykologlu.scenechangerjfx.SceneManager
